turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a coffee from a Starbucks location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where is the store located?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Like by Fairfax, it's in Hollywood. It's somewhere in the Fairfax area.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you have any milk preferences?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can you please confirm the size?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: a venti americano with 2% milk and whipped cream, is this correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, thanks. your coffee will be ready shortly for pickup at the starbucks in fairfax.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you will receive a text message with the receipt.
